install.name: Jentla_Flexile
install.author: Zacware
install.description: Jentla Flexile, a new vision for Joomla Administration

param.name: headerfadefrom
param.label: HEADER FADE FROM
param.description: Specify the header fadefrom colour

param.name: headerfadeto
param.label: HEADER FADE TO
param.description: Specify the header fadeto colour

param.name: footerfadefrom
param.label: FOOTER FADE FROM
param.description: Specify the footer fadefrom colour

param.name: footerfadeto
param.label: FOOTER FADE TO
param.description: Specify the footer fadeto colour

param.name: toolbarfadefrom
param.label: TOOLBAR FADE FROM
param.description: Specify the toolbar fadefrom colour

param.name: toolbarfadeto
param.label: TOOLBAR FADE TO
param.description: Specify the toolbar fadefrom colour

param.name: articleheaderbg
param.label: ArticleHeaderBg
param.description: Determines which background color will be used for table header

param.name: articletitle
param.label: ArticleTitle
param.description: Determines which color will be used for the table's heading

param.name: linkcolor
param.label: ArticleLinkColor
param.description: Determines which color will be used for links inside the table

param.name: articlerow0
param.label: ArticleRow0
param.description: Determines which background color will be used for table's odd rows

param.name: articlerow1
param.label: ArticleRow1
param.description: Determines which background color will be used for table's even rows

param.name: articlerow0hover
param.label: ArticleRow0Hover
param.description: Determines which background color will be used for table's odd rows on mouse over

param.name: articlerow1hover
param.label: ArticleRow1hover
param.description: Determines which background color will be used for table's even rows on mouse over

param.name: showicons
param.label: Show Icons
param.description: Display Icons

param.name: legend
param.label: Legend
param.description: Determines which color will be used for all the legend's title

param.name: bordercolor
param.label: BorderColor
param.description: Determines which color will be used for all the legend's border

param.name: inputboxbg
param.label: InputBoxBg
param.description: Determines which background color will be used for all the input box

param.name: inputboxfocus
param.label: InputBoxFocus
param.description: Determines which background color will be used for all the input box on focus

param.name: inputbox
param.label: InputBox
param.description: Determines which color will be used for all the input box caption

param.name: inputboxborder
param.label: InputBoxBorder
param.description: Determines which color will be used for all the text box border

param.name: leftMenuLinkColor1
param.label: Level-1 Link
param.description: Determines which color will be used for links in the left menu at Level 1

param.name: leftMenuLinkBackColor1
param.label: Level-1 BG
param.description: Determines which background color will be used in the left menu at Level 1

param.name: leftMenuOpenLinkColor1
param.label: Level-1 Link On Open
param.description: Determines which color will be used in left menu at Level 1 Link on open

param.name: leftMenuOpenBGColor1
param.label: Level-1 BG On Open
param.description: Determines which background color will be used in left menu at Level 1 on open

param.name: leftMenuLinkColor2
param.label: Level-2 Link
param.description: Determines which color will be used for links in the left menu at Level 2

param.name: leftMenuLinkBackColor2
param.label: Level-2 BG
param.description: Determines which background color will be used in the left menu at Level 2

param.name: leftMenuLinkOpenBackColor2
param.label: Level-2 BG On Open
param.description: Determines which background color will be used in the left menu at Level 2 while open

param.name: leftMenuLinkColor3
param.label: Level-3 Link
param.description: Determines which color will be used for links in the left menu at Level 3

param.name: leftMenuLinkBackColor3
param.label: Level-3 BG
param.description: Determines which background color will be used in the left menu at Level 3

param.name: leftMenuLinkOpenColor
param.label: Menu BG ON OPEN
param.description: Determines which link color will be used in the left menu while open

param.name: leftMenuOpenColor
param.label: Menu BG ON OPEN
param.description: Determines which background color will be used in the left menu while open

param.name: labelboxbg
param.label: LabelBoxBg
param.description: Determines which background color will be used for all the label box

param.name: labelboxtitle
param.label: LabelBoxTitle
param.description: Determines which color will be used for all the label box caption

param.name: buttonbg
param.label: ButtonBg
param.description: Determines which background color will be used for all the buttons

param.name: buttontitle
param.label: ButtonTitle
param.description: Determines which color will be used for all the button's caption

param.name: loginpagefadefrom
param.label: LoginPage Fade From
param.description: Specify the login page fade from color

param.name: loginpagefadeto
param.label: LoginPage Fade To
param.description: Specify the login page fade out color

param.name: restore
param.label: Restore Defaults
param.description: Restore Defaults
